versions.name: Nokia N-Gage Classic
versions.summary: The launch model of the Nokia N-Gage with its taco-shaped design came out in mid 2003. It was known to be clumsy to hold and also a big pain to insert games into because of you having to remove the back cover and battery before you could insert the game disc. Another clumsy feature was the way the microphone and speaker was situated on the edge of the phone, many described this as talking into a ''Taco phone''.
